text: @EnvAgency has set a 2030 net zero target ‚Äì reducing emissions by 45% and offsetting the rest. Our literature review assessed 17 offsetting approaches to understand the UK‚Äôs capacity and which approaches the EA may want to focus on. Find out more here: https://t.co/qlSjT1SHXA

urls.title: Petition: Ban Water Companies discharging raw sewage into water courses.
urls.description: Ensure Water companies treat the sewage they are responsible for. Not discharge it into rivers and water courses. After all what goes into the ocean comes back as the fish we eat.

urls.title: B-lines | Shropshire Wildlife Trust
urls.description: The B-Lines are a series of ‚Äòinsect pathways‚Äô running through our countryside and towns, along which we are restoring and creating a series of wildflower-rich habitat stepping stones. They link existing wildlife areas together, creating a network, like a railway, that will weave across the British landscape.

urls.title: Lake District river to have bends restored in flood prevention plan
urls.description: National Trust to slow Goldrill Beck in Ullswater Valley, allowing nature to mitigate storms

text:
A joint effort by the @EnvAgency and the @nationaltrust hopes to protect homes and businesses in the Ullswater valley of the Lake District by re-meandering the Goldrill Beck river.

Read the full @guardian article here https://t.co/OzVLyPT8YQ

#Floodprotection #community https://t.co/NDfSjE7HNM
